title: Casting Polymorph then Help, Pix! on Mordekaise ult ghost thingy crashes everyones game
body:
Both times I did it *everyone crashed.

Both times was miss fortune ghost.





*might not of been everyone but several people crashed each time.

replies.body: His rework is going live in a patch or two anyway.
Classic Morde, you never know what you're gonna get.
